about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a passionate software engineer with a strong focus on building scalable web applications and solving complex technical challenges. With expertise in modern web technologies, I transform ideas into robust, user-friendly solutions.
about.p2: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
